name: Ben
text: What....What am I looking at...Is that, a bar???

name: Ben
text: The last floor was just some weird bedroom but this one...

name: Ben
text: The floor is covered in sand??

name: Ben
text: There is no way I just saw a tumbleweed blow by I MUST be dreaming.

name: Ben
text: Achoo! Geez, got sand in my snout
